CustomField.description: Automatically populated to indicate if an account has the requisite number of Regulatory/Quality Contacts flagged to receive product notifications. For accounts with two or more contacts, two contacts must be designated as Regulatory/Quality Contacts. For accounts with only one contact on the account, the single contact must be designated as Regulatory/Quality Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Account meets the minimum requirements for product notification contacts. If 'Non Compliant', Account Teams must review the Account and assign the appropriate Contacts.
CustomField.label: R/Q Contact Compliant
